text: Keylor Antonio Navas Gamboa (born December 15, 1986) is a Costa Rican professional footballer who plays as goalkeeper for Nottanham Forest and the Costa Rica national football team. He currently wears the number 1 shirt for both teams. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League CupIncludes Copa del Rey, Coupe de France ContinentalIncludes CONCACAF Champions' Cup/Champions League, UEFA Europa League, UEFA Champions League Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Saprissa 2005–06 Costa Rican Primera División 2 0 — 0 0 — 2 0 2006–07 Costa Rican Primera División 3 0 — 0 0 — 3 0 2007–08 Costa Rican Primera División 15 0 — 0 0 — 15 0 2008–09 Costa Rican Primera División 26 0 — 5 0 — 31 0 2009–10 Costa Rican Primera División 27 0 — 4 0 — 31 0 Total 73 0 — 9 0 — 82Navas's complete statistics at Saprissa, from his debut in 2005 until his departure in 2010, are unclear.
